price: Por certo, aos que crêem e fazem as boas obras, O Misericordioso fá-los-á ter afeição mútua.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ سَيَجۡعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وُدّٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti sayajʿalu lahumu al-raḥmānu wuddan
